body_html:
Hi @andhus, thanks for the notice. I think this should be closed since I applied same fix to the tf.keras backend.

Currently there is manual sync process to bring fix/updates from keras/keras to tf.keras, usually this happens every few weeks. In this case, since I was aware of the issue on keras side, I just directly applied the same fix on tf.keras, which avoid the long waiting for the sync process.

I will take a close look since u mentioned it might not passing all the tests u have in other PR, will update this issue soon.

body:
Hi @andhus, thanks for the notice. I think this should be closed since I applied same fix to the tf.keras backend.

Currently there is manual sync process to bring fix/updates from keras/keras to tf.keras, usually this happens every few weeks. In this case, since I was aware of the issue on keras side, I just directly applied the same fix on tf.keras, which avoid the long waiting for the sync process.

I will take a close look since u mentioned it might not passing all the tests u have in other PR, will update this issue soon.
